channel.title: YOu dont lose some items, how to make them lose?
channel.description:
Hello,
I have 2 customs items, but if you die you dont lose them,
how could i fix this?
1th Item id == 13644 2th item id == 13645
You dont lose them, how to make them lose?
(They are not appeard as NOT ABLE To lose)
Thanks I D D S I,
